synopsis.text: King Inglis was a benevolent ruler who lived selflessly for his country and people. As he neared the end of his life, the king wished that in his next life he could further temper his skills as a knight. The goddess who oversees reincarnation heard King Inglis' wish and decided to grant it, but with an unexpected twist - the king was reborn as a cute girl in the far future! Despite her noble lineage and natural knightly talents, Inglis' aspirations were crushed when she was deemed unfit to be a knight at the tender age of six. Yet Inglis refuses to abandon her dream. Will she find a way to prove herself worthy and realize her wish to become the perfect knight? Or is her fate set in stone? Follow Inglis' adventures across space and time as she navigates her quirky new reality. With unbeatable determination and charisma, she's sure to capture hearts in this tale of reincarnation, legacy and conquering destiny against all odds.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
